text: The Louisiana Governor's Mansion is the official residence of the Governor of Louisiana and their family. The Governorâ€™s Mansion was built in 1963 when Jimmie Davis was Governor of Louisiana. The Mansion overlooks Capital Lake near the Louisiana State Capitol in Baton Rouge.
